name: The Darkness Beyond
description:
The Darkness Beyond is an interactive story created for a university project. We decided to base the events on an original SCP that we have created. You follow the story of the first test subject exploring SCP-7206, a story of fear and darkness with the hopes of finding safety. 

All feedback is greatly appreciated! This is our first attempt at an interactive story so we hope that it will be enjoyable.

Feel3
